alert.note: Alert for Bacon; Coffee; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 1:03PM EDT until March 31 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COFFEE...NORTHWESTERN PIERCE...NORTHWESTERN WARE AND SOUTHERN BACON COUNTIES... At 102 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles south of Nicholls, or 12 miles southwest of Alma, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Alma around 120 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bickley and New Lacy. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
